text: Kananjalo andithi kuni, mna ndinoovimba baka-Allâh, yaye futhi mna andinalwazi ngokungabonwayo, ndingakhanga nditsho nokutsho ukuba mna ndiyingelosi, kananjalo andithi abo amehlo enu abajongela phantsi uAllâh Akazi kubapha nantoni na elungileyo. UAllâh Uyakwazi okungaphakathi kubo. Ukuba bendinokwenza njalo bendiya kuba ngomnye wabagabadeli
